text: Vestavia Hills is a city in Jefferson and Shelby Counties in the U.S. state of Alabama. It is a suburb of the city of Birmingham. ==Notable residents== * Spencer Bachus - U. S. Representative for the 6th District of Alabama (R) * Pat Du Pre - Former top 20 professional tennis player; collegiate star at Stanford * Chris Hammond - Major League Baseball Pitcher (Reds, Marlins, Braves, Yankees, A's, Padres) * Eli Gold - Nationally known Sportscaster * Michael Papajohn - Hollywood Actor, Producer & Stuntman * Richard Scrushy - founder and former CEO of the physical rehabilitation healthcare company HealthSouth * Jeff Sessions - U. S. Senator from Alabama (R) * Don Siegelman - Former Governor of Alabama (D) * Bart Starr - American football quarterback * Jabo Waggoner - Alabama State Senator, Senate Minority Leader (R) * George B. Ward - former mayor of Birmingham == References == Category:Cities in Alabama
title: Vestavia Hills, Alabama
